name: Little Icarus
overview: As in the Greek Legend, Daedalus and his son, Icarus, have learned to fly using wings made of feathers and wax. Daedalus has flown away and Icarus sets off in search of him. Guide Icarus as he flies over the beautiful Greek countryside. Help him to avoid the evil Roc and the giant bees, and finally, after many miles of flying, help him catch up with Daedaus.
